actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-259.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4612) to temporarily delay the October 1, 1981, increase in the price support level for milk and to extend the time for conducting the referendum with respect to the national marketing quota for wheat for the marketing year beginning on June 1, 1982.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4612 (milk price supports).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4612) to temporarily delay the October 1, 1981, increase in the price support level for milk and to extend the time for conducting the referendum with respect to the national marketing quota for wheat for the marketing year beginning on June 1, 1982.
